title: The Gillies report
creator_credit: Ted Robinson, M I G Productions, Almost Managing Company and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Like a time capsule, this selection of highlights from the ABC television series “The Gillies report” captures some of the most memorable Australian political events, situations and politicians in a way you could never imagine. Features the brilliance and wit of Max Gillies along with some of Australia’s most highly talented writers and comedians including John Clarke, Wendy Harmer, Geoff Kelso, Richard Carleton, Tracy Harvey, Don Watson.
